name: The Rye in the Dark City [Act1]
name_original: The Rye in the Dark City [Act1]
description:
Entry to the SeedComp!

Play Detective Rye, a down-on-the-luck detective about to delve into a strange case...

Based on the names, locations, or plot points from following seeds:

  • The Witch's Bakery by Ramona G.   
  • Trouble in Toyland by Garry Francis  
  • Sage, Rose, Mary, and Time by Charm Cochran 
  • I won't sugarcoat it: this city needs more sweets by CSR 

CW: mention of murder, blood, violence...
